https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concering the specimen (set) in this state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/age._instruction: Enter the age of the specimen (set) in this state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/age.description: Time of life or existence at which some particular qualification, capacity or event arises.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/age.label: Age
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/age.name: age

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/attri._instruction: Add all attributes that can be ascribed to this tissue sample collection state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/attri.label: Attribute
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/attri.name: attribute

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/desce._instruction: Add all specimen states used to produce or obtain this tissue sample collection state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/desce.label: Descended from
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/desce.name: descendedFrom

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this specimen (set) state that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this specimen (set) state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen (set) state that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/patho._instruction: Add all (human) diseases and/or conditions that the specimen (set) in this state has and/or is a model for.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/patho.description: Structural and functional deviation from the normal that constitutes a disease or characterizes a particular disease.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/patho.label: Pathology
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/patho.name: pathology

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: If there is a temporal relation between the states of a specimen (set), enter the relative time that has passed between this and the preceding specimen (set) state referenced under 'descendedFrom'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Relative time indication
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relativeTimeIndication

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/weigh._instruction: Enter the weight of the specimen (set) in this state.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/weigh.description: Amount that a thing or being weighs.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/weigh.label: Weight
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/weigh.name: weight
